mapper.insert: insert into faq(seq, title, writer, content) values((Select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from faq),#{title},#{writer},#{content})
mapper.update: update faq set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from faq where title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from faq where content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from faq where writer like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
